label: Notify individuals of PII/SPII incidents within 5 business days after direction from Contracting Officer
quote: No later than 5 business days after being directed by the Contracting Officer...the Contractor shall notify any individual whose PII or SPII was either under the control of the Contractor or resided in an information system under control of the Contractor at the time the incident occurred.

label: Coordinate notification method and content with Contracting Officer and obtain written approval before proceeding
quote: The method and content of any notification by the Contractor shall be coordinated with, and subject to prior written approval by, the Contracting Officer. The Contractor shall not proceed with notification unless directed in writing by the Contracting Officer.

label: Notification method may include letters, electronic means, or public notice as approved by Government
quote: the notification method may consist of letters to affected individuals sent by first-class mail, electronic means, or general public notice, as approved by the Government.

label: Notification may require use of address verification and/or address location services
quote: Notification may require the Contractorâ€™s use of address verification and/or address location services.

label: Notification must include a brief description of the incident
quote: At a minimum, the notification shall include: (i) A brief description of the incident;
